answerTexts: No, it is one of the little bits around a flower.
No, it is a firearm you shoot people with.
No, it is the stalk that holds up the leaf on the branch.
Yes, it is the very tip of the leaf.
No, there are many, many veins down and throughout the leaf blade.
No, there is no vein along the leaf blade.
Yes, there is only one long vein down the leaf blade.
Veins are for people, silly leaf!
